question_full: How do I reset my UNSW password?
answer: You can reset your password using the [UNSW Identity Manager](https://iam.unsw.edu.au).

question_full: What should I do if I forgot my zID?
answer: You can recover or reset your zID at the [UNSW Identity Manager](https://iam.unsw.edu.au).

question_full: Where can I access my invoice or receipt for reimbursement?
answer: Invoices and payment documents can be managed through [myUNSW Reimbursement](https://my.unsw.edu.au).

question_full: Where can I view my class timetable?
answer: You can view and manage your class timetable in [myUNSW Timetable](https://my.unsw.edu.au).

question_full: How can I submit an assignment on Moodle?
answer: All course materials and assessments can be accessed via [UNSW Moodle](https://moodle.telt.unsw.edu.au).

question_full: How do I enrol, drop or change courses?
answer: To enroll, drop, or swap courses, visit the [UNSW Enrollment Portal](https://my.unsw.edu.au).

question_full: Where can I get IT support at UNSW?
answer: For any IT issues, contact UNSW IT Support via [it@unsw.edu.au](mailto:it@unsw.edu.au).

question_full: How do I manage my student visa or CoE?
answer: You can manage your student visa and CoE through [UNSW Student Services](https://student.unsw.edu.au/visa).

question_full: How to request an academic transcript?
answer: You can request your official academic transcript through [myUNSW Academic Records](https://my.unsw.edu.au).

question_full: Where to check my tuition fee deadline?
answer: You can check your tuition fees and due dates on [UNSW Fee Page](https://student.unsw.edu.au/fees).

question_full: How do I replace a lost student card?
answer: You can apply for or replace your student card via the [UNSW Student ID Services](https://student.unsw.edu.au/student-card).

question_full: What is considered plagiarism at UNSW?
answer: UNSW has strict academic integrity policies. Visit the [Academic Integrity Guide](https://student.unsw.edu.au/academic-integrity).

question_full: Where can I find internship or WIL opportunities?
answer: For internship and WIL programs, visit [UNSW Employability](https://www.employability.unsw.edu.au/).

question_full: How to apply for graduation at UNSW?
answer: You can apply to graduate and check dates at the [UNSW Graduation Portal](https://student.unsw.edu.au/graduation).

question_full: How do I borrow or renew books from the UNSW Library?
answer: Visit [UNSW Library](https://www.library.unsw.edu.au/) to borrow, renew books and access online resources.

question_full: How do I apply for special consideration?
answer: You can apply for special consideration at [UNSW Special Consideration](https://student.unsw.edu.au/special-consideration).

question_full: Where can I find student support or counselling?
answer: UNSW offers support via [Student Support Services](https://student.unsw.edu.au/wellbeing) including free counselling.

question_full: Where can I find parking information on campus?
answer: Parking information is available at [UNSW Parking Services](https://www.facilities.unsw.edu.au/parking).

question_full: What is MyAccess and how do I use it?
answer: You can use UNSW MyAccess to access school software from anywhere: [https://myaccess.unsw.edu.au](https://myaccess.unsw.edu.au).

question_full: How to access or setup my UNSW student email?
answer: All students get a university email account. You can access it via [UNSW Email](https://student.unsw.edu.au/email).

question_full: How do I access the checklist page?
answer: You can access the checklist interface here: Checklist Page.

question_full: Where can I view the timeline?
answer: You can access the timeline page here: Timeline Page.

question_full: Where can I find onboarding materials?
answer: All onboarding materials are available here: Material Page.

question_full: How can I update my profile?
answer: You can update your personal profile here: My Profile.

question_full: Where can I give feedback?
answer: You can submit your feedback here: Feedback Page.
